suite.name: KitchenBuddy

test.name: KB-01: Load KitchenBuddy portal and fetch customer order details

kw.name: As a "Admin" I want to open KitchenBuddy portal
kw.sourcename: As a "${ADMIN}" I want to open KitchenBuddy portal
kw.doc: this keyword ensures user is able to open kitchenbuddy portal

kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.
kw.msg: {"browser": "chromium", "headless": false, "args": ["--start-maximized"], "chromiumSandbox": false, "devtools": false, "handleSIGHUP": true, "handleSIGINT": true, "handleSIGTERM": true, "slowMo": 0.0, "timeout": 30000.0, "tracesDir": "C:\\TestQA\\Twilight\\automation\\foodstore\\results\\browser\\traces\\6307afca-ccac-46f2-a585-c0cf74bc97ea"}

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.
kw.msg: { "acceptDownloads": true, "bypassCSP": false, "forcedColors": "none", "hideRfBrowser": "", "ignoreHTTPSErrors": false, "javaScriptEnabled": true, "offline": false, "reducedMotion": "no-preference", "serviceWorkers": "allow", "viewport": null }

{'acceptDownloads': True, 'bypassCSP': False, 'forcedColors': 'none', 'hideRfBrowser': '', 'ignoreHTTPSErrors': False, 'javaScriptEnabled': True, 'offline': False, 'reducedMotion': 'no-preference', 'serviceWorkers': 'allow', 'viewport': None}

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://www.kitchenbuddy.nl/foodticket/cgi/admin.cgi?application=KA&language=en

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window or element and saves it to disk.

kw.name: Submit user details
kw.doc: this keyword ensures that authorized user is able to login to the portal.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'amirdhamutrecht' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'wijzigen' in the given field.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector span:has-text("Logged in as Vegnation") at state visible

kw.name: As a "Admin" I want to fetch customer orders
kw.sourcename: As a "${ADMIN}" I want to fetch customer orders
kw.doc: check customers orders exists then only start fetch

kw.name: Create File
kw.doc: Creates a file with the given content and encoding.

kw.name: File Should Be Empty
kw.doc: Fails unless the specified file is empty.

kw.name: Check customers orders exists
kw.doc: this keyword ensures that check customers orders exists or not. there is not test failure if there were no orders!

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Get Element
kw.doc: Returns a reference to a Playwright [https://playwright.dev/docs/api/class-locator|Locator].
kw.msg: TimeoutError: locator.waitFor: Timeout 10000ms exceeded. =========================== logs =========================== waiting for locator('div#kitchen-orders:has-text("There are no orders yet.")') ============================================================ Tip: Use "Set Browser Timeout" for increasing the timeout or double check your locator as the targeted element(s) couldn't be found.

kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``.

kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.arg: *** There are active orders present! Please wait while fetching orders!! ***

kw.name: As a "Admin" I want to close the browser
kw.sourcename: As a "${ADMIN}" I want to close the browser
kw.doc: this keyword ensures that browser is closed after all tests

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window or element and saves it to disk.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: this test case ensures that authorized user login and review and place orders ready for customer serve.

suite.doc: As an administrator I have ability to create and run orders using kitchenbuddy portal. For Example: In this scenario open the portal and fetch customer orders and then submit order ready state.
